biotools.summary: THPdb is a comprehensive database based on approved and approved/investigational therapeutic peptides compiling important information about these peptides, like their description, sequence, indication, mechanism of action, pharmacodynamics, toxicity, metabolism, absorption, half life, volume of distribution, clearance rate, patent information, interaction with other drugs, targets, physicochemical properties, etc.

bioschemas.name: thpdb
bioschemas.summary: THPdb is a comprehensive database based on approved and approved/investigational therapeutic peptides compiling important information about these peptides, like their description, sequence, indication, mechanism of action, pharmacodynamics, toxicity, metabolism, absorption, half life, volume of distribution, clearance rate, patent information, interaction with other drugs, targets, physicochemical properties, etc.
